channel.title: Vidue Stack Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
Changes

  • Vidue Stack can now find media after a show file has been moved.

Fixes

  • After renumbering a cue, go no longer attempts to jump to the old cue number.
  • An alert is now shown when opening a show from Finder if there are unsaved changes.
  • Missing media now shows as missing and can be replaced.
  • Fixes a small bug when saving a show with missing media.

item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
New Features

  • Typing a number before clicking the Add Cue button will create a cue with that cue number.

Changes

  • The up and down arrow keys now initially select the cues before and after the current cue.
  • After changing a cue number the stack will now scroll to show it's new position.
  • The cue stack will no longer scroll to the current cue after duplicating or deleting a different cue.
